short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search the wyr.es website without having to type out the website name. Quickly find the link you're looking for!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: For example: type "Go" into the box (after clicking the extension a popup will appear with a little search bar). Click enter and it will take you (in a new tab) to wyr.es/go - so easy!
